entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 06:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm near Enderby and Lumby. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
